3500.name: The Plains
3500.description:
This area is the plains. This is a vast desolate place where the wind
can howl undisturbed since nothing but you bars its way. However you are
not the first to wander here. before somebody has left a small path. The
path looks rather bewildered and is not the kind of path to lead to
anywhere significant or important but it seems to have made up its mind
to enter the hills far away north. A narrow trail scars its way off to
the east as it leads up towards a hillside. Buildings crowd together on
all sides. The cobblestones are worn smooth by countless feet.

north.description: A rocky path climbs toward The Hills

east.description: A steep trail ascends to A Scraggly Trail

south.description: The cobblestones lead to The Lane

3501.name: The Lane
3501.description:
The area is strolling along a pleasant, shady lane. The road is lined on
both sides by tall, stately trees which lend the scene with a sense of
quiet serenity. You can follow the road north or south. The sounds of
city life echo around. The smell of smoke and humanity hangs in the air.

north.description: The cobblestones lead to The Plains

south.description: The cobblestones lead to The Laneway

3502.name: The Laneway
3502.description:
The trees stand close here, and the tall, bushy undergrowth prevents you
from seeing far in any direction save east, where a broad lane continues
off into the distance; and west, where the same lane continues towards
what looks like a fairly large city. The muted sounds of city commotion
reach your ears from a distance; stray dogs barking, children crying,
and street salesmen shouting. A steep path leads down from here to the
northeast towards the Dwarven Village, and a small trail leads through
the trees towards the hills to the north. Buildings crowd together on
all sides. Vendors and pedestrians bustle past.

north.description: The cobblestones lead to The Lane

east.description: You see a fairly large road leading towards a grand castle in the distance.

west.description: The cobblestones lead to The City Entrance

down.description: The well trodden path leads down to the northeast towards a small bustling village.

3503.name: The City Entrance
3503.description:
The area opens on the outskirts of a large city - Midgaard; the capital
of this land. The road leads east into the peace and quiet - and dangers
- of the forest; and to the west it becomes the main street of the town;
surrounded by a confusion of shops, bars, and market places. The sounds
of city life echo around. Vendors and pedestrians bustle past.

east.description: The cobblestones lead to The Laneway

west.description: The cobblestones lead to Outside The East Gate Of Midgaard

3504.name: The South Gate
3504.description:
This area is a small, dusty path leading away from the south gate of
Midgaard, to the forest of Miden'Nir (Goblinic for 'Green Blood'). You
can still see the city to the east, but if you go south, there is fresh
air and greenery. Branches intertwine overhead, filtering the light. The
forest floor is carpeted with fallen leaves.

east.description: You can see the walls of the South Gate.

south.description: If you go south, you will enter the Miden'Nir.

3505.name: The Trail To Miden'Nir
3505.description:
This is a light forest. A path leads south, but the passage to the east
is easy enough. To the west, smoke can be seen rising above the
treetops. The sprawl of Midgaard lies north of here. Bird calls echo
through the canopy. Branches intertwine overhead, filtering the light.

north.description: To the north, you see the South Gate of Midgaard.

east.description: More light forest.

south.description: This path cuts through the darkness of the Miden'Nir.

west.description: The Woodsman's Inn can be seen a short distance to the west, it appears to be the source of the smoke.

3506.name: The Miden'nir
3506.description:
This is a dark forest. To the east, mountains block passage. From here,
only the lighter forest to the west or south offer a way to travel. The
scent of pine and earth fills the air. Branches intertwine overhead,
filtering the light.

east.description: The mountains can be seen jutting up to the east.

south.description: The forest is darker to the south.

west.description: The forest gets lighter as you go west.

3507.name: The Miden'nir
3507.description:
The forest is deep here and the wind blows through the trees and through
your hair. To the north, the forest gets lighter. However, the southern
and western paths place you even deeper in the wood. The scent of pine
and earth fills the air. Ancient trees rise on all sides.

north.description: The forest is lighter in this direction.

south.description: More and darker woods.

west.description: There is a small path leading west.

3508.name: On a Small Path
3508.description:
A path is here, leading east and south through the dark woods of
Miden'nir. Mountains slash the scenery to the west of here. Bird calls
echo through the canopy. The forest floor is carpeted with fallen
leaves.

east.description: Wind-swept forest.

south.description: To the south, the trail continues.

3509.name: The Miden'nir
3509.description:
The trees of Miden'nir are lush and green, hiding the evil that lurks in
these woods. The trees become too thick to the west, but you may go
north, south or travel toward the mountains that lie east of here. Bird
calls echo through the canopy. Branches intertwine overhead, filtering
the light.

north.description: The trees lighten up a bit this way.

east.description: Huge grey mountains lie in this direction.

south.description: The forest continues.

3510.name: A Crossroads
3510.description:
Here footworn paths meet leading north, south and east. The trees seem
to be closing in on you at this point, and you can barely see the sky
through the thick branches above your head. Bird calls echo through the
canopy. Ancient trees rise on all sides.

north.description: Trees as far as the eye can see.

east.description: There is an especially dark part of the forest this way.

south.description: There is an especially dark section of forest this way.

3511.name: The Trail
3511.description:
The area is a north-south trail through the woods. To the west,
impassable mountains glare at you, and the thick woods and undergrowth
prevent any movement westward. Ancient trees rise on all sides. Branches
intertwine overhead, filtering the light.

north.description: The trail bends to the north.

south.description: To the south, the path re-enters the forest.

3512.name: The Miden'nir
3512.description:
The trees of Miden'nir are lush and green, hiding the evil that lurks in
these woods. You can go north toward the mountains, or west to the
forest, but the steep mountains prevent any movement east. The scent of
pine and earth fills the air. The forest floor is carpeted with fallen
leaves.

north.description: The mountains can be seen to the north.

south.description: A light section of forest.

west.description: The forest continues here.

3513.name: The Miden'nir
3513.description:
The forest is dark, and becomes even darker west. You sense that there
is something evil hidden in these woods. The forest gets lighter to the
north. The wind kicks up as you ponder your options. The forest floor is
carpeted with fallen leaves. Bird calls echo through the canopy.

north.description: There is a small clearing to the north.

west.description: It gets darker and thicker this way.

3514.name: The Deep Forest
3514.description:
It is quite dark here, forest surrounds you. With each step, the forest
seems to close around, and get darker and more foreboding. It might
just be time to head back to somewhere safe. Branches intertwine
overhead, filtering the light. The scent of pine and earth fills the
air.

north.description: More forest.

east.description: Lighter forest and mountains in the distance.

south.description: More trees.

west.description: The forest continues.

3515.name: The Light Forest
3515.description:
The forest is light here and you can easily pick your way through the
trail. To the east, the forest becomes thick and darker. South, the
trail continues. Branches intertwine overhead, filtering the light. The
forest floor is carpeted with fallen leaves.

north.description: A trail leading north-south.

east.description: The trees get thicker as you go east.

south.description: More trees and some small hills.

3516.name: Some Muddy Ground
3516.description:
The ground is quite muddy here and puddles are all around. Your boots
make a disgusting SQUISH as you walk here. You can go in any of the four
cardinal directions from here. Hopefully, it will be dryer. Bird calls
echo through the canopy. Ancient trees rise on all sides.

north.description: The Miden'nir continues.

east.description: More trees.

south.description: The trees get VERY thick to the south.  You can barely see...

west.description: Some light trees and daylight.

3517.name: Near The Mountains
3517.description:
The most prominent feature here is the mountains that lie to the east.
You can only go north and west from here as the rocks stop all other
movement. Bird calls echo through the canopy. Branches intertwine
overhead, filtering the light.

north.description: Many trees to the north.

west.description: There is a bit of a slope downward to the west.

3518.name: The Fading Trail
3518.description:
The trail becomes nearly unpassable here. You can go north as the forest
is relatively light. To the south, Visible is a path. The forest floor
is carpeted with fallen leaves. Bird calls echo through the canopy.

north.description: You can see a trail this way.

south.description: Dark forests.

3519.name: The Dark Path
3519.description:
The area is hemmed in by trees on either side of you. The path continues
north and south, and while is much to thick to explore west, you can
head off into the woods to the west. Branches intertwine overhead,
filtering the light. The scent of pine and earth fills the air.

north.description: The forest gets lighter this way.

east.description: The forest continues.

south.description: There is a strong stench coming from this direction.

3520.name: The Dark Forest
3520.description:
You stomp your way through the underbrush. The dark forest of Miden'nir
get pretty thick here, and the branches high above your head are so
thick that they block out all direct sunlight. While it is much too
thick to go further east, you might be able to make your way though the
forest to the south and west. Branches intertwine overhead, filtering
the light. The scent of pine and earth fills the air.

south.description: The thick forest continues.

west.description: The thick forest continues.

3521.name: The Carnage
3521.description:
Here, you see a gruesome sight. Blood is everywhere... on the trees and
soaked into the ground. Two carcasses lie ahead, seeming to look up at
you. The forest is impassible to the south, but the other directions
look ok. Ancient trees rise on all sides. The scent of pine and earth
fills the air.

north.description: Darkness...

east.description: Your light does not extend that far.

west.description: More dark forest.

extra_descs: carcass body corpse carcasses bodies corpses

3522.name: Deep In The Forest Of Miden'nir
3522.description:
There is a sickening stench here. It smells of blood and death. To the
north, you catch glimpses of daylight. To the east, you simply cannot
see. The trees are close and stifling. Ancient trees rise on all sides.
The forest floor is carpeted with fallen leaves.

north.description: You see daylight and a trail to follow.

east.description: The stench seems to becoming from this direction.

3523.name: The Dark Forest
3523.description:
The branches above block out all direct sunlight, making the forest
in this area rather dark. The forest continues east, where it meets the
mountains. The air is still and stuffy - a stench comes from the west
and an ugly feeling causes the hair to rise on the back of your neck!
The scent of pine and earth fills the air. Ancient trees rise on all
sides.

north.description: It appears to get much darker that direction.

east.description: The forest appears to get much darker in this direction.

west.description: The sky becomes lighter in this direction.

3550.name: At The Foot Of The Mountains
3550.description:
The passage opens at the foot of the mountains, where it is much to
steep to continue north or east. You see the lush, green forest of
Miden'nir to the south and west. The path is steep and treacherous. The
air is thin and cold at this altitude.

south.description: The forest of Miden'nir spreads out before you.

west.description: The forest of Miden'nir spreads out before you.

3551.name: Deep In The Forest Of Miden'nir
3551.description:
The branches above block out all direct sunlight, making the forest
in this area very dark. The forest continues west, but mountains block
further exploration in all other directions, except south, where you
notice a small tunnel dug into the mountainside. Ancient trees rise on
all sides. The forest floor is carpeted with fallen leaves.

south.description: The tunnel leads into the mountainside.

west.description: The forest continues, but appears to be getting lighter.

3552.name: A Tunnel In The Mountains
3552.description:
The walls of this tunnel were carved out many years ago by the goblins
of this forest. The floor is well worn, and continues south, into the
mountain, or back north out into the forest. The smell of smoke and
humanity hangs in the air. The sounds of city life echo around.

north.description: Outside, you see the forest of Miden'nir.

south.description: The tunnel continues to the south.

3553.name: A Tunnel In The Mountains
3553.description:
The tunnel gets lighter to the north, presumably leading out, while to
the south the passage gets smaller and smaller. A small alcove has been
carved into the east wall. The sounds of city life echo around. The
cobblestones are worn smooth by countless feet.

north.description: The tunnel gets wider in this direction.

east.description: You see a small alcove.

south.description: The tunnel gets smaller in this direction.

3554.name: A Small Alcove
3554.description:
A small alcove has been carved out here. There are a bunch of twigs and
leaves thrown into a pile here, probably serving as a bed. Buildings
crowd together on all sides. Vendors and pedestrians bustle past.

west.description: You see the main passageway.

3555.name: A Tunnel In The Mountains
3555.description:
As you explore further into the mountainside, the tunnel gets smaller
and smaller to the south. You almost have to hunch over to make your way
through this area. A small archway to the south leads into a large
chamber. The cobblestones are worn smooth by countless feet. The smell
of smoke and humanity hangs in the air.

north.description: The tunnel continues north.

south.description: You see a small cavern.

3556.name: The Goblin HeadQuarters
3556.description:
The tunnel widens into a large (well, large for goblins) cavern that
serves as the living quarters for the goblins of Miden'nir. The bones of
numbers woodland creatures are strewn about the room, the remanents of a
recent meal. Buildings crowd together on all sides. Vendors and
pedestrians bustle past.

north.description: The tunnel heads north.

3570.name: The Front Of The Inn
3570.description:
This area is a well-worn path which opens into a clearing. An old,
wooden building is here with smoke billowing from its chimney. A painted
sign is visible on the porch to the west. You could go north or south
around the building or leave this place and return to the forest. The
scent of pine and earth fills the air. Branches intertwine overhead,
filtering the light.

north.description: You can go north around the Inn.

east.description: Back through the trees to the Miden'nir.

south.description: You can go south around the Inn.

west.description: The front door of the Inn beckons.

3571.name: North Of The Inn
3571.description:
The area opens north of the Inn. Things don't look much different from
this angle. The air here is filled with smells of smoke and cooking.
South, the front porch is waiting for you... or Visible is if there is a
back door. Branches intertwine overhead, filtering the light. The scent
of pine and earth fills the air.

south.description: You see the front of the Inn.

3572.name: South Of The Inn
3572.description:
The area opens south of the Inn. You could easily go north and enter
through the front door, or west and to the rear of the establishment.
You here some muffled cries from a tiny trail leading south of here. The
forest floor is carpeted with fallen leaves. The scent of pine and earth
fills the air.

north.description: This way leads to the front of the Inn.

south.description: The trail heads south.

west.description: This way leads to the back of the Inn.

3573.name: Behind The Inn
3573.description:
You now stand behind the Inn. The smell here is not so pleasant as the
keeper and his help throw a good deal of garbage here. A couple of piles
of rubbish are to the west, but you will smell the worse for meddling
there. As a clean alternative, you can go north or east around the Inn.
The forest floor is carpeted with fallen leaves. The scent of pine and
earth fills the air.

east.description: You can go around the Inn this way.

west.description: Only rats and fool adventurers play in garbage.

3574.name: The Woodsman Inn
3574.description:
This is the common room of the Woodsman Inn. A thin haze of smoke sits
in the air here. The Inn is often empty, as the forest has become
overrun by goblins as of late, and it is no longer safe in these parts.
The bar is just north of here. If you'd rather have your own table, one
is empty to the south. The smell of smoke and humanity hangs in the air.
Buildings crowd together on all sides.

north.description: The bar is here, manned by the Innkeeper.

east.description: You can leave now and return to fresher air.

south.description: An empty table is a rare commodity.

west.description: There is a table to the south occupied by a heavy drinker.

3575.name: The Ambush Point
3575.description:
This is a overgrown foot-trail south of the Inn. It leads west, but you
would be hard pressed to follow it far. A number of bushes are trampled
on and some medium sized branches have been knocked down. Obviously
there has been a battle here rather recently. The forest floor is
carpeted with fallen leaves. Ancient trees rise on all sides.

north.description: The Inn lies to the north.

west.description: A trail through the woods.

3576.name: The Bar
3576.description:
This is where people use to come and enjoy the food, drink and
hospitality of the Innkeeper, but as of late, he only serves the few
adventurers that manage to survive a trip through the forest. You can
leave south and return to the common room. The sounds of city life echo
around. The cobblestones are worn smooth by countless feet.

south.description: You may retreat south back to the common room.

3577.name: The Bard's Table
3577.description:
This is a darker corner in the Inn. A large round table with a few
wooden chairs sits here. There is a large stain on the table, the
remnants of a spilled drink. Vendors and pedestrians bustle past.
Buildings crowd together on all sides.

east.description: You see the main floor of the Inn to the east.

3578.name: The Garbage Dump
3578.description:
The area opens knee deep in garbage. YECCH!!! It smells terrible and who
knows what vermin live in these piles of filth... Bird calls echo
through the canopy. Ancient trees rise on all sides.

east.description: You can return to cleaner lands this way.

3579.name: A Quieter Section Of The Inn
3579.description:
There seems to be no one in this end of the Woodsman, probably a safe
place to rest and lick your wounds... The air is still and musty. The
walls are rough-hewn and cold to the touch.

north.description: You see the common room.

3581.name: On The Trail Of The Horsemen
3581.description:
The path continues east and west of here. You notice fresh tracks in the
soft ground that show the horsemen fled to the west. Ancient trees rise
on all sides. Branches intertwine overhead, filtering the light.

east.description: Back to ambush point.

west.description: The trail continues.

3582.name: On The Trail Of The Horsemen
3582.description:
The path continues east and south. You notice fresh tracks in the soft
ground that show the horsemen turned, and fled south. The forest floor
is carpeted with fallen leaves. Ancient trees rise on all sides.

east.description: The trail continues.

south.description: The tracks lead south.

3583.name: On The Trail Of The Horsemen
3583.description:
The trail of the horsemen continues east and north along this path
through the forest. The tracks are still fresh, so they must be near.
Bird calls echo through the canopy. Branches intertwine overhead,
filtering the light.

north.description: The trail continues.

west.description: The tracks lead east.

3584.name: A Dead End Trail
3584.description:
The path comes to an abrupt end here, as the trees close around and
make any further exploration impossible. Fresh tracks cover the ground,
and end right here. The horsemen must be nearby. The scent of pine and
earth fills the air. Branches intertwine overhead, filtering the light.

east.description: Back to along the trail.

3500.name: wyvern
3500.long_desc: A monstrous wyvern slowly circles just above your head.
3500.description:
This huge winged creature looks really menacing as it circles only inches
above your head, flapping its wings and squawking very loudly.

3501.name: goblin
3501.long_desc: A mountain goblin is wandering around mumbling to himself...
3501.description:
You see before you a small and twisted creature with knotted muscles and
disgustingly green skin.  Doesn't look like the type you'd invite to dinner.

3502.name: goblin
3502.long_desc: A goblin lieutenant stands here, attempting to get his men in order.
3502.description:
The goblin lieutenant is rather angry, and looking for one of his men to
beat up upon, but maybe you will do just fine...

3503.name: the Goblin King
3503.long_desc: Grukthar the Goblin King towers over his throne, snarling.
3503.description:
The leader doesn't look too happy that you have found him here.  He grabs
for his shortsword and lunges for your neck.

phases.message: The Goblin King beats his chest and calls for reinforcements!
The Goblin King flies into a berserk rage!

abilities.name: Bomb Toss
abilities.telegraph: The Goblin King lights a crude bomb and hurls it high!

3504.name: boy
3504.long_desc: A small boy sits here, licking his wounds.
3504.description:
The poor boy has numerous cuts and scratches, but appears to be all right.
He is apparently the only survivor of the ambush.

3505.name: innkeeper
3505.long_desc: The Innkeeper stands here, cleaning glasses.
3505.description:
The Innkeeper now spends most of his days waiting for customers, while the
nights are spent watching out for goblins.  His inn is no longer the happy
place that is used to be in days past.

3506.name: bard
3506.long_desc: A sullen bard is here, drinking away his problems.
3506.description:
You can smell the alcohol on his breath from across the room.  This poor
bard has been sitting here quite a while, drinking himself into oblivion.

3507.name: horseman
3507.long_desc: A dark horseman is here, mounted on his black steed.
3507.description:
The man is obviously an outlaw, and has no qualms about slashing you into
little bits.

3501.name: sword
3501.room_desc: A long sword has been left here.

3502.name: club
3502.room_desc: A simple looking wooden club is here.

3503.name: jacket
3503.room_desc: A studded leather jacket is lying on the ground.

3505.name: corpse
3505.room_desc: A mutilated corpse has been left on the ground here.

3506.name: corpse
3506.room_desc: A mutilated corpse has been left on the ground here.

3507.name: dagger
3507.room_desc: A beautiful looking dagger is stuck in the ground.

3508.name: gyroscope
3508.room_desc: A small toy is spinning about on the ground here.

3509.name: a jagged goblin crown
3509.room_desc: A jagged crown fashioned from scrap metal lies here.

3510.name: a bomb satchel
3510.room_desc: A soot-stained satchel of goblin bombs sits here.

3511.name: a kingly cleaver
3511.room_desc: A brutal cleaver etched with goblin runes lies here.
